thread.title: Issues Resolved! Puli To Release All Over The World
thread.title_full: Issues Resolved! Puli To Release All Over The World

title: Issues Resolved! Puli To Release All Over The World
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Vijay 's Puli release was stalled due to last minute financial disturbances and cube locks were unreleased till now due to delay in the clearances. However, all the issues were sorted now as Vijay himself stepped in to resolve the issue. Puli (U): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
He reportedly gave a word to a prominent financier and asked him to clear all the debts and brought in a clearance for the film's release. 
The Telugu version of Puli is releasing in huge number of theaters all over Andhra Pradesh and Telangana and SVR media acquired the rights for a whopping price. Puli Telugu version must collect a theatrical share of 8.5 Cr to be a profitable venture. 

Apparently, Puli will roar from the 10 AM show all over the Telugu states and Vijay fans were already waiting at the theaters since last night. 
Fans, who were disappointed due to the cancellation of premieres, are still hooking around the theaters to catch the film at the first show. 
Also, many of the Tamil as well as Telugu celebrities took to twitter to support Vijay in this tough situation as they felt it is a pre-planned ploy on Vijay.
